sql.name: faultimpactdatamonthlypage.group
sql.item: select t.groupname from ( select g.c630000018 groupname from {100} g where g.c630000021='2' and g.c630000020='000000000600001' and g.c630000027='1' union all select trim('网管中心') groupname from dual ) t

sql.name: faultimpactdatamonthly.group
faultimpactdatamonthly.left
sql.item: select trim('故障时间(小时)线路') from dual union all select trim('故障时间(小时)传输设备') from dual union all select trim('故障时间(小时)传输连接件') from dual union all select trim('故障时间(小时)网管系统') from dual union all select trim('故障时间(小时)电源') from dual union all select trim('线路故障时间(小时)一干') from dual union all select trim('线路故障时间(小时)二干') from dual union all select trim('线路故障时间(小时)城域核心') from dual union all select trim('线路故障时间(小时)城域接入') from dual union all select trim('电路不可用时长(2M小时)线路') from dual union all select trim('电路不可用时长(2M小时)传输设备') from dual union all select trim('电路不可用时长(2M小时)传输连接件') from dual union all select trim('电路不可用时长(2M小时)网管系统') from dual union all select trim('电路不可用时长(2M小时)电源') from dual union all select trim('电路不可用时长(2M小时)一干') from dual union all select trim('电路不可用时长(2M小时)二干') from dual union all select trim('电路不可用时长(2M小时)城域核心') from dual union all select trim('电路不可用时长(2M小时)城域接入') from dual union all select trim('合计故障时间') from dual union all select trim('合计电路阻断时长') from dual union all select trim('电差错控制项电路不可用时长') from dual

sql.name: faultimpactdatamonthly.centervalue
sql.item: select trim('故障时间(小时)线路'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000004),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('故障时间(小时)传输设备'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000005),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('故障时间(小时)传输连接件'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000006),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('故障时间(小时)网管系统'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000007),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('故障时间(小时)电源'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000008),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('线路故障时间(小时)一干'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000009),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('线路故障时间(小时)二干'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000010),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('线路故障时间(小时)城域核心'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000011),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('线路故障时间(小时)城域接入'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000012),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('电路不可用时长(2M小时)线路'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000013),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('电路不可用时长(2M小时)传输设备'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000014),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('电路不可用时长(2M小时)传输连接件'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000015),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('电路不可用时长(2M小时)网管系统'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000016),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('电路不可用时长(2M小时)电源'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000017),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('电路不可用时长(2M小时)一干'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000018),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('电路不可用时长(2M小时)二干'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000019),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('电路不可用时长(2M小时)城域核心'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000020),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('电路不可用时长(2M小时)城域接入'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000021),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('合计故障时间'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000022),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('合计电路阻断时长'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000023),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('电差错控制项电路不可用时长'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000024),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002
